}

item.title: Using 3 items to make 1
item.dc:creator: @Renob Renob
item.description:
@Renob wrote:

Is there something wrong with this code? Can someone help me, I’m trying to make it so you need 3 items, then when you use one gs shard on the other, with the last in your inv, you get the godsword blade. Here’s my code

else if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15342) { else if(playerHasItemAmount(15343, 1)==false) sendMessage("You need all 3 shards to make a Godsword Blade"); } else if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15342) { else if(playerHasItemAmount(15343, 1)==true) deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); addItem(15331, 1); }

Read full topic
